thinking: My task is to first go to the wooden barrel. I see a wooden barrel on the left-hand side of my view, near a fence. There are also some wooden crates further away near the building on the right-hand side. To orient myself towards the target wooden barrel, I will turn left.
The wooden barrel is now mostly in the center of my view, slightly to the left-hand side. I am facing towards it. To get closer to the barrel, I need to move forward.
I've moved closer to the wooden barrel. It is now clearly centered in front of me. My goal is to reach it, so I will continue moving forward.
The wooden barrel is very close and directly in front of me. I need to take one more step forward to reach it.
I am now standing directly in front of the wooden barrel. This completes the first stage of my task, which was to go to the wooden barrel.

I have reached the wooden barrel. The second part of my task is to proceed to the main entrance door. I need to locate it. The large building was generally on my right-hand side before I approached the barrel. I will turn right to start looking for the entrance.

I can see the wooden barrel on the left-hand side and the large building with stairs on the right-hand side. The entrance is likely in the direction of the building and stairs. I need to turn more to face it. I will turn right again.

Now I am facing the building. I see stairs leading up to an arched area in the center and slightly to the right-hand side, which probably contains the main entrance door. I need to move forward to get closer to the stairs.
I am closer to the stairs now. They are directly in front of me. I need to continue moving towards the stairs to reach the entrance area.
I am right at the bottom of the stairs. The arched entrance is directly ahead at the top of the stairs. I need to move forward to start climbing the stairs.

I am at the base of the stairs. The path up the stairs seems to curve slightly towards the right-hand side as it ascends towards the archway. To align better with the path upwards, I will turn slightly to the right.
I am now aligned with the stairs leading up towards the arched entrance. The path is clear in front of me. I will move forward to go up the stairs.

I have moved partway up the stairs. From this position, the entrance archway appears slightly on the left-hand side relative to my current direction. To face the archway more directly, I will turn slightly to the left.
I am now facing the stairs leading directly into the arched entrance area. The path is clear. I need to continue moving forward to ascend the stairs.
I am further up the stairs and getting closer to the top. The entrance archway is directly in front of me. I will continue moving forward.
I am nearly at the top of the stairs. The arched passageway leading towards the entrance is directly ahead. I need to move forward to enter it.
I have reached the top of the stairs and entered the covered walkway area under the arch. I need to find the main entrance door, which should be along this walkway. I will move forward.

I am proceeding along the walkway. I don't see the main entrance door immediately in front. There are columns on the right-hand side and an opening to an outdoor area. The entrance might be further along or perhaps visible from a different angle. I will turn towards the right-hand side to scan the area visible through the arches.

After turning, I see the walkway continues forward, curving slightly to the left in the distance. There are stairs leading down on the right-hand side. I still haven't spotted the main entrance. I should follow the walkway forward.

I am moving along the covered walkway. It curves towards the left-hand side ahead. I can see some furniture against the left wall. The main entrance door must be further ahead along this path. I will continue moving forward.

As I move forward, I can now see a large wooden door on the left-hand side wall. It looks like the main entrance door, and there's text above it. It is currently on the left-hand side of my view. I need to get closer, so I will move forward.
I am closer now. The main entrance door is clearly visible on my left-hand side. To face it directly, I need to turn left.
I've turned left, but the door is still slightly on the left-hand side of my view. I need to turn left a bit more to center it perfectly.
Now I am facing the main entrance door directly. It is centered in my view. I need to move forward to reach it.
I have arrived directly in front of the main entrance door. This completes the second stage of the task. My overall task is finished.
